query: 'SELECT
    claim_id,
    -- solo la fecha normalizada
    CASE
        WHEN TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 103) IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 103)  -- DD/MM/YYYY
        WHEN TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 101) IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 101)  -- MM/DD/YYYY
        WHEN TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 120) IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 120)  -- YYYY-MM-DD
        ELSE NULL
    END AS claim_date,
    sale_id,
    repair_status
FROM [bronze].[warranty]
WHERE sale_id IS NOT NULL
  AND (
       TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 103) IS NOT NULL
    OR TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 101) IS NOT NULL
    OR TRY_CONVERT(date, claim_date, 120) IS NOT NULL
  )',
